description: Returns a paginated list of application associations for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the Application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationAssociations
nested_items.description: List of Application Associations for the Application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Application Association.

nested_items.name: ApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Application.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the client that is associated with the Application Association.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
